actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.
Executive Comment Requested from Arms Control & Disarm Agcy, State.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security and Scientific Affairs
Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that negotiations pursuant to the 1979 NATO decision concerning the deployment of nuclear weapons in Europe should be vigorously pursued by the United States and that the United States should commit itself to a clearly defined timetable for completion on such negotiations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the United States should pursue negotiations to limit deployment of nuclear weapons in Europe; (2) the development and deployment of such weapons should be deferred until the negotiations are concluded and ratified; and (3) the negotiations should be part of a comprehensive international effort to limit nuclear weapons.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that negotiations pursuant to the 1979 NATO decision concerning the deployment of nuclear weapons in Europe should be vigorously pursued by the United States and that the United States should commit itself to a clearly defined timetable for completion on such negotiations, and for other purposes.
